trans-unit.source: The password is missing: please enter your new password.
trans-unit.target: The password is missing: please enter your new password.

trans-unit.source: The password is not in a valid format.
trans-unit.target: The password is not in a valid format.

trans-unit.source: The confirmation is empty: please fill in the password confirmation as well.
trans-unit.target: The confirmation is empty: please fill in the password confirmation as well.

trans-unit.source: The password and its confirmation do not match. Please double check both passwords.
trans-unit.target: The password and its confirmation do not match. Please double check both passwords.

trans-unit.note: Context: File: controllers/admin/AdminLoginController.php:341 Comment: check matching employee id with its email

trans-unit.source: You can reset your password every %d minute(s) only. Please try again later.
trans-unit.target: You can reset your password every %d minute(s) only. Please try again later.

trans-unit.source: Your password reset request expired. Please start again.
trans-unit.target: Your password reset request expired. Please start again.
trans-unit.note: Context: File: controllers/admin/AdminLoginController.php:349 Comment: To update password, we must have the temporary reset token that matches.

trans-unit.source: An error occurred while attempting to change your password.
trans-unit.target: An error occurred while attempting to change your password.
